name: beat-card-deck
description: Generate print-ready production beat cards from CSV/JSON.

scripts.generate:sample: node bin/beat-cards.js generate --beats data/beats.sample.csv --shots data/shots.sample.csv --out dist --pdf true --page A5
scripts.generate:today: node bin/beat-cards.js generate --beats data/beats.sample.csv --shots data/shots.sample.csv --out dist/today --pdf true --template narrative --today 3
scripts.generate:perday: node bin/beat-cards.js generate --beats data/beats.sample.csv --shots data/shots.sample.csv --out dist/perday --pdf true --bundlePerDay true
scripts.generate:letter2x: node bin/beat-cards.js generate --beats data/beats.sample.csv --shots data/shots.sample.csv --out dist/letter2x --pdf true --page Letter --tile 2x
